<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MIDExtensionConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Constants used by MID server extensions.</description>
        <name>MIDExtensionConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function MIDExtensionConstants() {}
MIDExtensionConstants.EXTENSION_DEF_TABLE = 'ecc_agent_ext';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_TABLE = 'ecc_agent_ext_context';
MIDExtensionConstants.EXECUTING_ON = 'executing_on';
MIDExtensionConstants.COMMAND_START = 'START';
MIDExtensionConstants.COMMAND_STOP = 'STOP';
MIDExtensionConstants.COMMAND_RESTART = 'RESTART';
MIDExtensionConstants.COMMAND_RESELECT = 'RESELECT';
MIDExtensionConstants.COMMAND_UPDATE_PARAMETERS = 'UPDATE_PARAMETERS';
MIDExtensionConstants.COMMAND_CLEAR_ERROR = 'CLEAR_ERROR';
MIDExtensionConstants.STATUS = 'status';
MIDExtensionConstants.AGENT_STATUS_UP = 'Up';
MIDExtensionConstants.AGENT_STATUS_DOWN = 'Down';
MIDExtensionConstants.CHOICE_MID_SERVER = 'Specific MID Server';
MIDExtensionConstants.CHOICE_MID_SERVER_CLUSTER = 'Specific MID Server Cluster';
MIDExtensionConstants.CHOICE_AUTOSELECT_MID = 'Autoselect MID';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_STATUS_STARTING = 'Starting';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_STATUS_STARTED = 'Started';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_STATUS_RESTARTING = 'Restarting';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_STATUS_STOPPING = 'Stopping';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_STATUS_STOPPED = 'Stopped';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_STATUS_OFFLINE = 'Offline';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_STATUS_ERROR = 'Error';
MIDExtensionConstants.CONTEXT_STATUS_WARNING = 'Warning';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETERS = 'parameters';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER = 'parameter';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_NAME = 'name';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_VALUE = 'value';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_CONTEXT_SYS_ID = 'ContextSysId';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_CONTEXT_NAME = 'ContextName';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_CONTEXT_DATA = 'ContextData';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_EXTENSION_COMMAND = 'ExtensionCommand';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_COMMAND_REASON = 'ExtensionCommandReason';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_EXTENSION_NAME = 'ExtensionName';
MIDExtensionConstants.PARAMETER_EXTENSION_CLASS_NAME = 'ExtensionClassName';]]></script>
